title: The story of how I found my main

replies.body:
(Bard was just released)

Friend: Yeah, the new champ sucks ass.

Me: Is that a challenge?
You, I like you.

Ooooh {{champion:134}}

Then saw her in my game first time.

Heard the voice over: "More, I can be so much more!" with a moan. My heartbeat rose.

Incredible exponential rising power?

Extremly attractive, courvy woman with big brests, fantastic hips, exotic lips?

An epicly cool dress with a devilish crown?

Eager for power? Uncontrolable and stubborn mentallity?

Likes to dominate?


OH BABY, SYNDRA! BE MY GODDESS FOREVER! *___*

I can't anti-joke the anti-joke because that would be a contradiction, like lying about a lie. Now I am full of existential angst as I question the purpose of me typing in this thread.

back when I was still in my beginnings, I was always annoyed to fight the MF bot because her E slowing me all the time, so I decided I would pick her up and see what her kit does. Thus I fell in love with her run and gun style and her laugh while she melts teams with her ult
{{champion:37}} I just loved her style of being able to be a jill of all trades, plus nobody ever expects my powerchord damage
{{champion:254}} Just such a great stress reliever for me. I love her ability to just make people's lives hell with my damage output, plus whenever someone flashes with my ult going for them i just shout "I'M NOT DONE WITH YOU!"

and I've been maining Top kench ever since.

Opened Augment Cache 1 week ago.
Got DJ {{champion:37}} Skin Shard.
Has 0 orange essence.
Has 0 IP.
Doesn't own Sona.
1 week Grind later.
just unlocked everything.
Watch out peeps, mastery 0 Sona Main incoming!

It was the "A Hero's Calling" comic for her rework.

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TEbCgulOngk/Vl4bNZ7Q7NI/AAAAAAAAJNs/L_KMXBzoDOw/s1600/hero5.jpg

The raw emotion she portrays struck me.

When I was younger, I had this daft desire of being a 'hero".  Someone who helps and saves others. I realized that when I stopped a friend from committing suicide.  Before I thought to myself, "How could I possibly help.  I don't know what to do.  I'm useless."  But, a voice spoke in the back of my head.  Telling me I was the only one who could.  So I yelled at her and begged her please because if nobody truly cared, I wouldn't be around yelling at her during that instance. 

The expression on Poppy's face is reminescent of that moment.  You don't believe you're capable of helping others, of being able to accomplish some far off feat, but you refuse to give up and do so anyways cause, if you don't, who would?

{{champion:240}} 
He looks cool. Maybe I should try him.
ONE MATCH LATER
17/10
I think I found my new mains.

A friend recommended me the game, so while I downloaded the launcher I looked at the champ roster. (I joined at Braum's release)

{{champion:34}}  BIRD! I need it!
{{champion:53}} (I was a Skyrim addict at the time.) Hey dosnt he look like a Dwarven Centurion? Need it!
{{champion:50}}  Another bird/Tactition! Cant beat that for me, Need it! But I'll get the other two first.

Played Aniv and Blitz. I learned I was a Horrid Anivia. Blitz was insanely easy though, so I mained him. Then came the time to buy a new champion. What's the only thing better then birds? {{champion:102}} Dragons. Bought her, I only played one match where I stupidly decided to use a refund on her. So..... what to get with my 4800 IP? I then remembered how bad I wanted {{champion:50}} Bought him, realized he's basically Easy-Mode Anivia. SO I mained him for a long time. When it was about tiem to become level 30, I got into two more champs. I tried {{champion:34}} Out again, and realized I could play her now, And that she was awesome.(Her voice is so soothing....) And since it was time to hit 30, I felt one champion a lane was a good idea. I had all the lanes covered but one, ADC. I hate/Hated ADCs. So I wanted someone who didn't FEEL like an ADC. And then I came by this cute little guy{{champion:96}} Loved him. And he quickly joined my top 5 favorite champs.

Now time for Post-30. I decided I could go for a new tank.(This was shortly before the whole Cinderhulk thing.) And I came across {{champion:113}} And fell in love with her. She became my favorite Jungler. Then, I bought {{champion:102}} again, who I now realized how much fun she was. That, and I go her top lane.

So to end it all off......

My #1 highest mastery, and favorite champ.{{champion:34}} 
My 2nd favorite champ, and the only one even close to the amount of Mastery Points Aniv has, {{champion:96}} 
My 3rd favorite quickly became {{champion:50}} 
4th is {{champion:113}} 
5th, for a long time was in fact {{champion:102}} , But now that {{champion:13}}  was reworked, I fell in love and he is quickly taking that spot. 
And {{champion:53}} was quickly forgotten, I think he's like mastery 2 for me. 

I mean.... I know it's more of the story of my Main(s) But still, It was nice writing out. For Old time's sake.

P.S. Yes. I played {{champion:268}} . I'm not that great at him. The only bird not in my collection. I'd go for {{champion:133}} But I hate her new ult.....(Not quite 'new' when it's been months now but still....

{{champion:432}} was released.

Oh boy I already like support role maybe I should try him.

Several losses later...

Nope, don't like him.

Several months later...

Hey, let's try Bard again!

Won that game, played him more, got Mastery 6 going onto 7.

Good times.
